item.title: Mentioned by Owen Sound Sun Times
item.description:
NDP MP Tyrone Benskin has problems with federal taxman
OTTAWA — NDP MP Tyrone Benskin's debt to Revenue Quebec isn't the former actor's first brush with the taxman. Court documents obtained by QMI Agency reveal that in 2003, the Canada Revenue Agency took Benskin to federal court over $135,473.03 in ...
